ai-tha-ap466:1.2_0: While walking mindfully in the presence of the excellent Buddha,
ai-tha-ap466:2.2_0: what I build up lotus ponds.
ai-tha-ap466:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap466:3.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap466:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap466:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Setavyā.
ai-tha-ap466:7.1_0: with the senior monk and the fourth partridge.
